Desert Essence Facial Cleansing Pads (2019 formulation)

Brand: Desert Essence

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) WATER, ALCOHOL DENAT, ECO-HARVEST MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT*, ANTHEMIS NOBILIS FLOWER OIL (CHAMOMILE)*, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL*, CYMBOPOGON SCHOENANTHUS OIL (LEMONGRASS OIL), CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*,

FLOWER EXTRACT*, ANTHEMIS NOBILIS FLOWER OIL (CHAMOMILE)*, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL*, CYMBOPOGON SCHOENANTHUS OIL (LEMONGRASS OIL), CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*, HEDYCHIUM CORONARIUM (GINGER) ROOT EXTRACT, FUCUS VESICULOSUS (BLADDERWRACK) EXTRACT, MELIA AZADIRACHTA (NEEM) SEED OIL, CARTHAMUS TECTORUS (SAFFLOWER)

RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*, HEDYCHIUM CORONARIUM (GINGER) ROOT EXTRACT, FUCUS VESICULOSUS (BLADDERWRACK) EXTRACT, MELIA AZADIRACHTA (NEEM) SEED OIL, CARTHAMUS TECTORUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL*, GLYCERIN, WATER (AQUA)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
